devdoc.author: Colin John LeMesurier

params.key: the patients medicare number used as a key

params._content: the content of the record entry
params._title: the title of the record entry

params.index: the index for the requested patient

getPatient(uint256).return: an object containing requested patient's data

params.patientIndex: the index of the patient whose record is being requested
params.recordIndex: the index of the record requested

getRecord(uint256,uint256).return: the object of the record requested

params.key: the patients medicare number used as a key

devdoc.title: A storage method for hospital patients and medical records

createPatient(string,uint256).notice: Create and store a patient's infomation in the blockchain

createRecord(uint256,string,string).notice: Create a record for a patient specified by ID.

getPatient(uint256).notice: Returns a patient using their ID number as the index.

getRecord(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns a patient's record using the patient ID and record ID as the indices.

isPatient(uint256).notice: Method to check if a patient already exisits in the blockchain
